website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and comfortable, these Jordan slides are a solid choice if you’re looking for a slide with a slipper-like feel.
pros: Classic Air Jordan logo is displayed across the Velcro strap, which is adjustable for a custom fit
Cushioned, contoured footbed provides shock absorption and massages feet with each step
Rubber sole is durable, giving the slides a longer life than those with foam soles
cons: Strap can be a bit too wide for comfort, and there are reports that the synthetic materials hold on to odors

customer_reviews.title: True to Size
customer_reviews.text: I buy Slides a couple times a year and these are by far the most form fitting. Not the most comfortable compared to previous Slides but still very good.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic jordan sandals. They look and feel great, very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great. They last a very long time. Longer than the last pair of JORDAN sandals I had. I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: kenny

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve known not to order when the description doesn’t even include the size of the shoe... But I took my chances because of the price. When I received the gift for my boyfriend, I opened the box to see that it was completely damaged and held together by a rubber band. I haven’t even looked at the shoes because it’s a gift I want him to be able to unwrap. Presenting someone a gift in a box that looks like this is embarrassing, and for that this product gets 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like them , with the adjustment they will fit almost any width foot . Real or not very comfortable . I sent two other ones back from different companies . Theses r much better , they do NEED to list size on the ad though , almost didn’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: GOAT
customer_reviews.text: I tried several less expensive brands and was always very disappointed. There’s only one Jordan and it only stands to reason that Jordan slides are the greatest of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best in the business sandels
customer_reviews.text: Great . These are the best sandels made . I tried the Nike and the under armour . And adidas . These are by far the best .
customer_reviews.author: Emad Tadros

customer_reviews.title: Great for swollen feet.
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a first for someone who had surgery and swollen feet. They liked that the front is adjustable and Velcro. Good padding on the soles.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend purchasing these slippers they look good and feel good ...
customer_reviews.text: Most comfy slippers ever I will be puschasing a pair for me next!! Highly recommend purchasing these slippers they look good and feel good I know because I like to steal his slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy12

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I wear size 13 shoe so I bought a size 12 so they'd be nice and snug. Perfect!!!

customer_reviews.title: Foot odor
customer_reviews.text: The sandal is very comfortable but the material it’s made of cause a terrible foot odor .

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he loves them. Very comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Blister Maker
customer_reviews.text: Painful because they were preformed in storage. I got a massive blister above my big toe.

customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Definitely not knock offs. Came in jordan brand Nike box and wrapping. Fit perfectly and look and feel cool

customer_reviews.title: True to size..comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: The advertisement:”Nike Men's Jordan Hydro 6 Slides”.. Ordered size 6 mens slide got size 12.
customer_reviews.text: They advertised Nike Men's Jordan Hydro 6 Slides Sandals, Black White Wolf Grey. I figured the “Hydro 6Slide” was a size 6 slide. I live these slides but they were a size 12 mens & I wear a men’s size 6.
customer_reviews.author: Lane&Fran Lobaugh

customer_reviews.title: It's no superstar 3G
customer_reviews.text: Since owning a pair of Adidas Superstar 3Gs for year and years I finally had to replace them. I couldn't find any like them and the new Superstar 5Gs weren't comfortable. These Jordan's are serviceable but they aren't that comfortable like the 3Gs were sad to say.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort !
customer_reviews.text: I am a large man and these are great.They fit good ,they have arch support,good traction.

customer_reviews.title: Great!

customer_reviews.title: Make more with this mold ....ijs
customer_reviews.text: Great for me I'm piegeontold like Michael Jordan...that why I buy a lot of his footwear.. Because we wear the same size 13 & that works for me..

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them, they came right on time on Father's Day! After working all day in hot work boots he puts these slides on when he get in home!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good slides!! My husband originally purchased his and liked them so much he bought me a pair. They are very comfortable and light weight. Definitely would recommend others to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: I believe I can fly in these Jordan’s
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I’m very happy with the fit style and comfort

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves them, I bought a size 13 his exact size and they fit perfect. He says they are very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Smooth on the bottom of your feet, much better that the hard ridges on the other brands.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love Jordan hydro 6 but this was the wrong color for me. I want the white pair. But I think this is a great shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the Grey only color version, but still Jordan! They totally are worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Tums21

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a size down from his Jordan sneaker size
customer_reviews.text: For my 16 year old son and he's very picky about how he looks going to school. He is a size 12 in Jordan sneakers/ball shoes, but got a size 11 in these, and fit perfectly. Ordered on a Sunday night and arrived before dark onTues, just in time for 1st day of school on Wednesday, 8/8/18. Hate that I needed them when they cost $60, a week later they are $48, but considering they are Jordans AND my son was satisfied with them, priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. Super comfortable with adjustable strap for wider feet. He's been wearing them everyday while he works at home during quarantine
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved them zero complaints and he likes to complain lol.
customer_reviews.author: stoney
